affect ( "iSam", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	set ( "SET_LOOK_OFF", "FULL" );
	set ( "SET_ANIM_SEQUENCER", "OFF" );
	set ( "SET_ANIM_LOOP", "ON" );
	set ( "SET_ANIM", "Body|Script|Full+None+Normal+Stand|Sleeping on bed" );
	set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_IGNOREPAIN", /*@BOOL_TYPES*/ "ON" );
	set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_INVINCIBLE", /*@BOOL_TYPES*/ "ON" );
}
